circumstances: While in normal cruise, the aft cargo door opened. The pilot shut down the right engine and attempted an emergency landing when the airplane struck power cables and crashed. The pilot was slightly injured while the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause:
Collision with wires/poles on final approach after inadequate preflight preparation. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Improperly secures,
- Improper action, 
- Forced landing off airport on land, 
- Door/panel open in flight, 
- Lateral control problem, 
- Aft cargo door opened in flight,
- Unmaintained altitude.
